name: Trevenant
flavorText:
It can control trees at will. It will trap people
who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

previous.name: Phantump
previous.flavorText:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
